pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculates the Wavelet-Based Organization Index // Calculates the wavelet-based organization index following Brune et al (2018) (doi:10.1002/qj.3409), the modified wavelet-based organization index and the local wavelet-based organization index of an arbitrary 2D array using Wavelet Transforms of the LS2W package by Eckley et al (2010) (doi:10.1111/j.1467-9876.2009.00721.x) and Eckley and Nason (2011) (doi:10.18637/jss.v043.i03). In Version 1.0.3 the calculation of LW is added.
